item.title: Dialogue Problem (The Heads)
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

Alright…I have this dialogue for vannaka

case 6889: // Starting Armour
				sendFrame200(4883, 591);
				sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
				sendFrame126("Here, Take Some Starting Armour And Weapons.", 4885);
				sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
				sendFrame164(4882);
				addItem(1323, 1);
				addItem(1175, 1);
				addItem(1067, 1);
				addItem(1115, 1);
				NpcDialogueSend = true;                                
                                break;

and I also have this code for the lumbridge guide

case 195://welcomer in rellekka
				sendFrame200(4883, 591);
				sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
            			sendFrame126("Welcome, to the massive world of LeScape Pk V2,", 4903);
            			sendFrame126("there is much to do in this world, but I'm going", 4904);
            			sendFrame126("to help get you started. First off, I what should", 4905);
          			sendFrame126("I call you?", 4906);
          			sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
            			sendFrame164(4900);
            			NpcDialogueSend = true;
           			break;

Vannaka’s head moves and whatnot like he’s actually talking, but the lumbridge guide’s does not. it’s a still frame, any ideas?

Read full topic
